body_html:
I got this error even after building from source once.

Helpful debugging for this problem:
ldd ~/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C*.so

I found that it had linked against a bunch of Torch libs in ~/anaconda/lib, probably from a prior conda install. I did rm ~/anaconda/lib/libTH* and it worked. Well, that is, after the same ldd also told me that it was trying to link against CUDA 8 and I'd actually wanted the 7.5 build :)

body:
I got this error even after building from source once.

Helpful debugging for this problem:
`ldd ~/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C*.so`

I found that it had linked against a bunch of Torch libs in `~/anaconda/lib`, probably from a prior conda install. I did `rm ~/anaconda/lib/libTH*` and it worked. Well, that is, after the same `ldd` also told me that it was trying to link against CUDA 8 and I'd actually wanted the 7.5 build :)
